Headline.text: The most complete suite for any Silverlight application

Highlight.text: Intuitive API and short learning curve
600+ ready to use samples in XAML SDK

Highlight.description: Instant responsiveness is the number one factor for a good user experience. Regardless of the amount of data used, Telerik RadGridView delivers unbeatable desktop-like performance thanks to intelligent row and column virtualization, container recycling, and so on. Try the example with 1 billion cells and get WOWed.

Highlight.text: Advanced Grouping and Filtering for Complex Data
Highlight.description: To understand large and complex data users need powerful slicing and aggregation tools. Telerik’s powerful grid is armed with Excel-like filtering, multi-column sorting and complex grouping features. Thanks to the advanced Data Filter and Expression Editor users get virtually unlimited capabilities for data analysis, which used to be possible only in desktop applications.

Whether you are using WCF RIA Services or not, bringing the data to your Telerik-powered apps is effortless. Powerful controls like the RadDataPager and RadDomainDataSource will take care of the intricate data access so you can focus on the business logic.

Highlight.text: Instant Operations with Heavy Hierarchical Data
Highlight.description: Oftentimes LOB applications need to access large hierarchical data. Telerik controls handle this function gracefully thanks to powerful virtualization and item caching. As a result memory consumption is low while user experience and productivity are high.

Rich and attractive charts are the best way to present data trends and relationships. Telerik RadChart covers the most demanding requirements for performance, fidelity and interactivity. No matter if you are working with 10 or 10,000 datapoints you can enjoy dozens of 2D and 3D chart types with real-time zooming, scrolling, and drill-down.

Highlight.text: One Control, So Many Ways to Display Your Geospatial Data
Highlight.description: Working with geographic and location-based data is crucial to many businesses—view where more resources are needed, how customers in an area are responding to advertising campaigns, how stores in a region are doing with sales, and so on. RadMap allows for displaying both multi-scaled providers like Bing Maps or OpenStreetMaps, single-image providers for custom implementations, or even ShapeMap-based data for custom layouts and diagrams. Regardless of how you need geospatial data displayed you have it covered in a single control.

Highlight.text: Analyze and Navigate Data Trends over Time
Highlight.description: Many scenarios require the display and navigation of huge data over a span of time. With Telerik RadTimeBar you can present a generalized view of the data and tie selected regions to other data visualization controls for detailed inspection. This is how modern interactive dashboards are created.

Highlight.text: Create Microsoft-Word-like Interfaces in Your Business Applications
Highlight.description: Creating documents has traditionally been the responsibility of desktop office applications. Thanks to RadRichTextBox you can easily create a Microsoft Word-like environment with advanced word-processing capabilities. It’s the most powerful Silverlight-based rich text editing solution on the market.

Highlight.text: Enter and Validate Data with Accuracy
Highlight.description: To ensure data integrity, applications need to enforce accurate data entry. Telerik’s RadMaskedInput control handles all scenarios for accurate entry of text, numeric, currency, and date-time values, while providing visual hints and validation warnings to the end users.

To address personal preferences modern LOB applications need to offer workspace personalization capabilities. With the RadDock control you allow end users to dock, resize, pin, and float the various application panels, while preserving the customized layout for the next time they log in.

Highlight.text: Microsoft Office-like Ribbons for Intuitive Navigation
Highlight.description: Many business applications nowadays use the Ribbon navigation systems, because of their usability. You can easily create such an interface using Telerik’s RadRibbonView control. From contextual tabs to Backstage view it offers everything you need even for the most demanding scenarios.

Highlight.text: Browse Data Items with Stunning CoverFlows
Highlight.description: Great applications offer great new visual ways to browse and review data items. Make smaller collections of data items much easier to understand and navigate by using Telerik CoverFlow. It is easy to use and completely customizable in terms of appearance and behavior.

Highlight.text: Tiled Interfaces for Smart Screen Utilization
Highlight.description: When screen real estate is scarce, you can use modern approaches like tiled interfaces. RadTileView is the perfect solution that allows users to focus on one piece of information at a time, while keeping the rest neatly tiled yet readily accessible.

SampleApp.title: Outlook Inspired App
SampleApp.description: In this demo application we joined the powers of some of the most prominent controls in UI for WPF to create one of the most recognizable UIs in the world – Microsoft Outlook. You can easily spot GridView, RibbonView, ScheduleView, RichTextBox and Calendar how blend seamlessly.

SampleApp.title: ExecutiveDashboard
SampleApp.description: Get the sales breakdown across products, countries and quarters. Windows 8 UI, theming, and real-time customization ensure end-user value for any sales theme.

SampleApp.title: CRM
SampleApp.description: Telerik CRM demo application is a next generation Customer Relationship Management (CRM) solution intended to help a fictional sales person through the trials and tribulations of his day-to-day experience. The demo showcases how an inspiring UI, complex background logic and entertaining user experience can be put together using Telerik UI for WPF.

SampleApp.title: Sales Manager Dashboard
SampleApp.description: Follow sales trends across products, countries, and quarters. Windows 8 UI, theming, and real-time customization ensure end-user value for any executive team.

SampleApp.title: Color Theme Generator
SampleApp.description: Color Theme Generator is WPF solution for customizing Telerik themes. The tool is built with Telerik UI for WPF controls and offers an intuitive and rich UI.
